    public class MessageAdapter
extends com.firebase.ui.firestore.FirestoreRecyclerAdapter<ChatMessage,com.example.mechachromemobileapp.Adapters.MessageAdapter.MessageHolder>
    MessageAdapter Class handles displaying chat messages information based on FirebaseUI
